name: Asana
description: Asana helps teams efficiently organize, track, and successfully manage their projects – thanks to our Axon Ivy Connector, access is effortless and seamless.

descriptions.value: Asana helps teams efficiently organize, track, and successfully manage their projects – thanks to our Axon Ivy Connector, access is effortless and seamless.
Asana hilft Teams, ihre Projekte effizient zu organisieren, zu verfolgen und erfolgreich zu steuern – dank unseres Axon Ivy Connectors ist der Zugriff mühelos und unkompliziert.
